body.text: 1) Every object in a state of uniform motion tends to remain in that state of motion.
2) Force equals to mass times acceleration.
3) For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.
(If the sum of F= 0, v= constant)
= distance from the centre of the earth
Newtonian Gravitation * Particles attract other particles with a force directly proportional to the square of the distance between their centres and the product of their masses
